info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: Component "KC Model Multiskill Converter" generates a new KCM that is single-skilled per step from an existing KCM that is multi-skilled per step.

ul.li: Datashop KC Model ExportRequired. The Datashop KC Model Export file can be exported from the KC Models tab of the Datashop Dataset Info page. Here is an example of a KC Model Export file with a multi-skilled KCM: Datashop KC Model Export

A new KC Model file with the new single-skilled KC model that is converted from an existing multi-skilled KC model. This file is ready to be used to import the new single-skilled KC model back to Datashop
KC Model to Convert: Select a Multi-skilled model that is to be converted
